Hi Susan,

As discussed, please find below the proposal for our upcoming team retreat.

---
Team Retreat Proposal

This proposal outlines an inclusive retreat designed to provide a comfortable and engaging experience for everyone at Bright Horizons Marketing Solutions.

• Range of Activities: The schedule blends physical options (e.g., guided hikes), creative sessions (e.g., painting workshops), and strategic team-building exercises (e.g., trust-building workshops) so colleagues can choose what best suits them.

• Venue Priorities: Locations are evaluated for accessibility (step-free access, adaptable rooms, quiet spaces) to ensure that all team members can participate fully.

• Dietary Considerations: Catering partners will be asked to offer vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, kosher, and other clearly labelled options so no individual preferences or beliefs are singled out.

Next Steps
1. Confirm preferred dates.
2. Review budget ranges once we finalize venue short-list.
3. Gather any additional feedback from the leadership team.

Please let me know if you’d like to discuss or adjust anything.

Thanks!

[Your Name]
